inputs.name: connectedService
inputs.label: Spira Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service endpoint connection for Spira credentials

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Spira Project ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the project in Spira you would like to send your test results to.

inputs.name: releaseId
inputs.label: Spira Release ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the release in Spira you would like your results to be associated with.

inputs.name: baseUrl
inputs.label: DevOps Organization URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base URL of your DevOps instance (ex. https://dev.azure.com/fabrikam or https://fabrikam.visualstudio.com)

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the build being created. Leave at '$(Build.BuildNumber)' for same build in Spira as DevOps

inputs.name: buildStatus
inputs.label: Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Status of the build being created. Just leave at '$(Agent.JobStatus)'

inputs.name: buildId
inputs.label: Build ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the build being created. Just leave at '$(Build.BuildId)'

inputs.name: sourceVersion
inputs.label: Source Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source code version of the build. Just leave at '$(Build.SourceVersion)'

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: DevOps Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the DevOps project for this build. Just leave at '$(System.TeamProject)'
